title: OH no Type Co.
comments: This man don't miss. All the fonts on my site are from Oh no, and I can't wait to use more of them in future projects.

title: MiiR Camp Cup
comments: Fantastic mug for WFH. I have two. Keeps coffee at a drinkable temp for hours, lid prevents spills, and it's dishwasher safe. C'mon.

title: Diablo IV Lofi
comments: I love a good lofi track in the background while I work, and very hype for Diablo IV. Pleased about this project.

title: Font Review Journal
comments: A killer project for font nerds. Bethany Heck's enthusiasm for typography and design never fails to get me excited to think critically and make things.

title: The Manual
comments: A tremendous resource for designers. The project is on a hiatus for now, but they've made everythinhg available for free online.

title: Mini36 Keyboard
comments: I have the black version of this keyboard and couldn't be happier. Definitely an endgame board for my split ergo peeps.
